creator: chris_j_davey@hotmail.com
text:
The "current" JK2 ISAPI component is out of date. The version at 
http://www.apache.org/dist/jakarta/tomcat-connectors/jk2/ is from November 2002 
and does not include changes made in Feb 2003- notably the sendGroups fix to 
avoid querying Windows for users group lists, which is important for usability 
in a large site.

Perhaps you could update the current source and binary packages ?
